0:
until [ -f /snapshots/kopia.repository.f ]; do
    printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Waiting for the Kopia repo to become ready ..."
    sleep 1
done

nodeAffinity:
  preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
    - weight: 60
      preference:
        matchExpressions:
          - key: kubernetes.io/arch
            operator: In
            values:
              - amd64
              - i386
              - i686
              - x86
